content: if you are looking for a nice and quick pattern as a gift or as a decoration here s what you need the **tuima heart** is a great addition to your home decor and it has a lot of potential use it as a bunting as an applique or crochet some together to make a doily the possibilites are endless it works up super fast and it s easy enough for an adventurous beginner as it has a full step-by-step photo tutorial exclusively available on my blog ** here 1 ** you can also download a print friendly version completely free from my ravelry store **special thanks to my testers ** *mirjam annaars cheryl freeman jo harvey becky hummel ginny kamph-white zannah söderlind* **difficulty ** intermediate **size ** 5 5 /14 cm **materials needed ** 4 mm f size hook * i used silver metal streamline by furls * **paintbox yarns cotton dk** in the following shades and quantities o daffodil yellow-422 2 grams 5 metres/5 5 yards c1 o paper white-401 5 grams 12 5 metres/13 75 yards c2 o washed teal-433 3 grams 7 5 metres/8 25 yards c3 o dusty rose-442 7 grams 17 5 metres/19 25 yards c4 **total 17 grams total yardage approx 42 5 metres/ 46 75 yards** yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors stitch markers * optional * **us terms** used throughout **no chart/diagram available ** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina* 1 https //kamecrochet com/2024/02/14/tuima-heart-free-crochet-heart-pattern/
